about_the_game:
Samhain is an investigative horror game where players are tasked with identifying and destroying various monsters. Samhain can be played with up to four players online or over LAN.

Players can work out their target's identity by surveying their environment for various clues. Claw marks, ectoplasm, notes, corpses, and more all provide valuable information to the investigation. Once players determine which monster they're hunting, they have until midnight to gather enough supplies to destroy it. Each enemy has unique strengths, weaknesses, and behaviors that must be taken into account during the investigation. Preparing for the wrong type of enemy will result in a bloody death.

content_descriptors.notes:
Game contains scenes of characters being killed in various ways by a number of monsters. Options to censor these first-person animations exist but there is not currently an option to censor the other blood and gore.

Depictions of dead and maimed humans/ animals will be seen during gameplay.

short_description: Samhain is an investigative horror game that can be played solo or with up to four players online. Investigate brutal murder scenes and determine what creature was responsible. Next, gather tools and items to help you survive. At midnight, the monster returns.
